items.title: Home Depot (HD) Eyes Stock Market Payoff With Contrarian Tariff Strategy
items.description: Home Depot (HD) is charting a different course on tariffs. While competitors like Walmart (WMT) plan to raise prices on tariff-impacted goods, Home Depot aims to maintain steady prices, thanks to its flexible product lines and diversified supply chain. Although the company remains exposed to broader macroeconomic pressures, such as a slowdown in housing development, I believe itâ€™s well-positioned for a strong rebound as conditions stabilize.
